travelActions.title: Maintenance
travelActions.text_1stPerson: I got my vehicle serviced recently
travelActions.fact: Improve fuel efficiency by 4 % with a proper tune up or over 1 lb CO2e daily.

travelActions.fact: Travel gametab gametab gametab gametab gametab Driving 20 fewer miles per week saves 1, 062 lbs.of CO2 and $175(EPA).

travelActions.title: Tires
travelActions.text_1stPerson: I inflated my tires to the correct pressure
travelActions.fact: Properly inflated tires can maximize your miles per gallon, and for every gallon of gas saved, 20 pounds of CO2 wonâ€™ t be released into the atmosphere

travelActions.title: Offsets
travelActions.text: Offset your travel foot print by buying carbon credits from Chooose
travelActions.text_1stPerson: I offset my travel with CHOOOSE
travelActions.fact: CHOOOSE buys carbon credits on your behalf, each representing one tonne of CO2 reduction.We then tear them up and remove them from circulation completely.The money paid for carbon credits goes to UN - certified clean energy projects in developing countries.

travelActions.title: Carpool
travelActions.fact: Carpooling has a big impact!Carpooling eases traffic congestion and reduces greenhouse emissions.On average, sharing a ride with one other person to work and back will reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 3.72 kilograms.

travelActions.title: Ride share
travelActions.text: Share a Lyft or Uber ride
